c74object.name: ta.bpm-ms
c74object.digest: bpm to ms and vice versa
c74object.description: Convert beats-per-minute to milliseconds as well as milliseconds to beats-per-minute.

inlet.description: If the input value is in beats-per-minute the output will be in milliseconds and vice versa

outlet.description: If the input value is in beats-per-minute the output will be in milliseconds and vice versa. The number out the outlet is always in floating-point format.

method.name: int
method.description: If the input value is in beats-per-minute the output will be in milliseconds and vice versa.

method.name: float
method.description: If the input value is in beats-per-minute the output will be in milliseconds and vice versa.

example.caption: beats-per-minute to milliseconds and milliseconds to beats-per-minute

entry.name: float
entry.description: If the input value is in milliseconds the output will be in beats-per-minute. And if the input value is in beats-per-minute then the output will be in milliseconds.
